title: Spacious Studio available
posting_body: ['1845 South Bascom Avenue, Campbell, CA', 'Apartments for rent in an amazing location!', 'Find yourself walking distance to restaurants, stores, banks, Camera 7 theater, the light rail station (VTA) and the Los Gatos Creek trail.', 'Also, less than a mile from downtown Campbell and Ebay.', 'You will hardly find a need to own a car.', 'Amenities', '•\ton-site laundry room', '•\tassigned parking', '•\tElevator on site', '•\tpool with BBQ area', '•\tpet friendly community with pet stations for your convenience', '•\twe are steps from Los Gatos Creek trail.', '•\tSteps away from multiple shopping centers', 'Lease Terms', 'Deposit: $800', 'Lease duration: 12 months', 'Details', 'Studio / 1 Bath     in East Campbell', 'Rent:', '$1,825', '/month', '400 square feet', 'Pets Allowed: Cats & Dogs', 'Amenities', 'Assigned Parking', 'On Site Laundry']
